title: Inquiry-Based Scaffolding Argumentation Learning Design Course for Strengthening Preservice Elementary Teachers' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Elementary Curriculum, Foundational Knowledge of Social Studies Teaching-Learning Methods
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling accommodating learners balancing work responsibilities. Establishment of online learning environments utilizing personal devices.

learning_goals: Problem-solving strategies can be applied using argumentation skills in scientific literacy-based inquiry activities.
Instructional design capabilities are enhanced by incorporating peer feedback through team-based collaborative learning.
Elementary social studies lesson materials can be developed based on critical thinking and scientific attitudes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
